CustomField.formula: IF( AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Scale", Scale_Surplus_Lines_Filing__c = FALSE), (Premium__c + Policy_Fee__c + Wholesale_Fee__c - Commission_New__c - Risk_Management_Fee__c), IF( AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Scale", Scale_Surplus_Lines_Filing__c = TRUE), (Premium__c + Wholesale_Fee__c + Policy_Fee__c + State_Tax__c + State_Stamping_Fee__c +State_Fees_Other__c - Risk_Management_Fee__c - Commission_New__c ), (Premium__c + Wholesale_Fee__c + Policy_Fee__c + State_Tax__c + State_Stamping_Fee__c +State_Fees_Other__c + FS_Fees__c + Program_Fee__c - Risk_Management_Fee__c - Commission_New__c) ) )
CustomField.label: Invoice Amount
